com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.conversion

Class Conversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.conversion.type.ConversionTypes
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.conversion.Conversion

  • public class Conversion
extends ConversionTypes
    Stores all available converters to convert Object values to a requested type

      • register

        public static void register(Converter<?> converter)
        Registers a converter so it can be used to convert to the output type it represents. If the converter does not support registration, it is ignored
        Parameters:
        converter - to register

      • getConverter

        public static <T> Converter<T> getConverter(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Obtains the converter used to convert to the type specified
        If none is available yet for the type, a new one is created
        Parameters:
        type - to convert to
        Returns:
        converter

        Parameters:
